sentences.sContent: Most companies have suffered a drop in their profits, even very large companies.
sentences.sCn: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.sContent: It was quite difficult to see, even with the light on.
sentences.sCn: 这很难看得见，即使开着灯也没有用。

sentences.sContent: He became quite successful and even appeared on a television show once.
sentences.sCn: 他相当成功，甚至还上了一次电视节目。

sentences.sContent: She did not even bother to phone us.
sentences.sCn: 她甚至连电话都没打给我们。

sentences.sContent: He never even acknowledged my letter.
sentences.sCn: 他收到我的信甚至从不会告知一声。

sentences.sContent: This will make our job even more difficult.
sentences.sCn: 这会使我们的工作难上加难。
